definitions.title: Po‘ēl, act severely
definitions.body: (toward) (NH id., deal with (rare), and deriv.; Ar. 9al=a do a thing (drink, beat, give) a second time, II. divert, occupy,  v. divert, occupy oneself with (food, a woman, etc.); Syr. 9elto0 cause, occasion, affair);—act severely, alw. c. [[ל]] pers.: Pf. 2 ms. [[עוֹלַלְתָּ לִי]] La 1:22 as thou hast acted severely to me (in punishment, subj. ´[[י]]); ´[[לְמִי ע]] La 2:20 to whom hast thou acted thus severely ? 3 fs. [[עֵינִי עוֹלְלָה לְנַפְשִׁי]] La 3:51 my eye deals severely with me, i.e. gives me pain (?; text dub.; cf. Perles:Anal.18 Bu). Imv. ms. [[עוֹלֵל לָמוֹ]] La 1:22 deal severely with them.—Vid. also ´[[ע]]

definitions.title: Pō‘al
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[מַכְאׂבִי אֲשֶׁר עוֹלַל לִי]] La 1:12 my pain which is severely dealt out to me.

busy, divert oneself with (cf. Ar. v.), alw. c. [[ב]] pers.: 1 S. ´[[אֶת־אֲשֶׁר חִתְעַלַּלְתִּי בְּ]] Ex 10:2 (J) how I [´[[י]]] have made a toy of  Egypt; esp. deal wantonly, ruthlessly with ([[ב]] pers.): 3 ms. [[הִתְעַלֵּל]] 1Sa 6:6; 2 fs. [[הִתְעַלַּלְתְּ]] Nu 22:29 (JE; Balsaam's ass); 3 pl. [[וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ]] consec. 1Sa 31:4 = 1Ch 10:4, Je 38:19; Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּתְעַלְּלוּקּבָהּ]] Ju Jdg 19:25 (of abusing a woman; ‖[[וַיֵּדְעוּ אׂתָהּ]]).

definitions.title: Hithpō‘.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לֵהִתְעוֹלֵל עֲלִלוֹר]] Ps 141:4 to practise practices in wickedness (perhaps denom.).
